snippet: Co-founded by Ben Lovett of Mumford & Sons, the London-New York label has become a global tastemaker, as evidenced by its popular new club nights in various U.S. cities. Check out Lovett’s exclusive playlist of his favorite Communion offerings.
abstract: Co-founded by Ben Lovett of Mumford & Sons, the London-New York label has become a global tastemaker, as evidenced by its popular new club nights in various U.S. cities. Check out Lovett’s exclusive playlist of his favorite Communion offerings.

headline.main: Listen Up | The Lofty Ambitions of Communion Records
